General.Name: Scryb Inc
General.Description: Scryb Inc., a technology company, provides platform to power businesses and technologies, applied intelligence, real-time analytics, and actionable insights in Canada. It offers Cybeats On-Device platform, a supply chain cybersecurity and IoT device security; Software Bill of Materials Studio, a solution designed to manage and distribute software bill of materials in a single platform; Fionet Platform, an end-to-end, rapid testing and tracking technology solution for community-based or decentralized settings. The company was formerly known as Relay Medical Corp. and changed its name to Scryb Inc. in December 2021. Scryb Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 65 International Blvd, Toronto, ON, Canada, M9W 6L9
